items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress
items.body: I was sold by the other girl who posted pictures and videos of this dress. It looked so good on her, and looked so pretty, I had to get it or take a chance. I bought a short sleeved dress from this brand ( blue floral ) and it was ok, but this one I love love. It’s definitely my style, I love mesh maxi dresses, with floral designs, but I been on the look out for long sleeves ones and this one is it! This one is now my new favorite dress. I did size up. I’m usually a Medium. But I learned with the short sleeve one that the arms on these are tight and I have thick arms plus I lift ( makes the upper part of my arms and shoulders thicker ), soooo I went with Large on this one for extra room and it was perfect. I think the medium would have fit just fine but would have been tight around the arms. I would say if you have thick arms size up or need extra room anywhere. It is stretchy. This dress is gorgeous, sexy, and looks fancy too. Super comfortable. It is lightweight so you could wear it year long. In the winter I have the thick fleece leggings to keep me warm. But it is perfect for any season. I love the ruffles. I already ordered the pink one too and will buy other designs, and colors because I need them all. Also I noticed that the black lining is sewed into the dress which is perfection because it makes it easier to put on. The other one I have from this brand that is short sleeved did not have it sewed in and makes it so hard to put on. Overall I love everything about this dress, definitely worth the price and great quality. I had the other one for months and no issues. No rips, holes, etc. I would say wash in cold water and hang to dry for it to last longer. I would highly recommend this dress. Read more
items.author: Maria

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the price
items.body: This dress is honestly amazing for the price. I am 5’8 and 130lbs and the size small fit perfectly. It has a great stretch to it, but still looks really nice in my opinion. Bought for a funeral, but I’d def wear this again. Read more
items.author: Jeffrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous! Get it
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I got sooo many compliments on this dress last night! This my new favorite dress. Very flattering, soft and made very well. I’m 5’6 and 215 lbs. I got an extra large and it fit perfectly. Dress has decent amount of stretch to it. BUY IT!!! Read more
items.author: Kelley H.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Came used.
items.body: Product came used. Smells so much like armpits and perfume at the same time. Read more
items.author: adriana aguirre

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: This dress is great! Lots of stretch and very corfortable. Looks just like picture. True to size Read more
items.author: Sarah ochoa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars gorgeous, flattering dress BUT
items.body: I must advise this dress is gorgeous BUT when I took it out of the packaging it had that gross fufu smell and I had to let it air out for a few days. You've been warned! That being said, the dress is absolutely gorgeous. I ordered a M and it's perfect (I'm 5'3", 135#, 27.5" waist 38" hips), if anything I probably could've sized down. It's true to size, a great length and I can wear with any kind of shoe. The fabric is soft and comfortable, the print is so pretty. I love how elegant this dress is and thought it was a great fit to have on deck for any upcoming holiday events. It's perfect for fall and winter. Just be prepared for the stink (removed a star because of this, it was really gross). Read more
items.author: Luis & Kristen A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love!
items.body: Love love love this dress! Wish they had an X Small available because I like more fitted clothing but it fits perfectly! I’m between 115-120 pounds and 5’1 for reference Read more
items.author: Heidy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do it
items.body: Beautiful dress and fits great. 157 and I got a size large. A medium would have fit, but may have been tight. Nice length. Read more
items.author: Ashley grieger

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Leopard Print, Yellow Print, Multicolor, Pink Print, Polka Dot Print, Red Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
